txt.en: 'That was far too close, [placeholder]! Hurry, let us return before others appear and overwhelm us or follow our path to the camp.'
'Come now, we must not risk being seen here again. Let us head back to the mill.'
Instance: The Shield-maiden's Training

'The wild bears are oft seen among the trees nearby. We must look only for the largest, most ferocious bears; they must offer a challenge if I am to improve my abilities.\n\n'Let us begin the hunt. I am eager to learn through observing your skills.'
Ides has been defeated
You have successfully hunted bears with Ides
Ides has been defeated
Ides can be found waiting along the road.\n\nIdes wishes to speak with you about hunting the wild bears.
Ides has been defeated
'Ah, a worthy foe!'
Ides has ventured with you into the woods.\n\nIdes wishes to speak with you about the hunt.
'Uruk-hai scouts search this way. Hold your ground... we have been discovered!'
The Uruk-hai scouts have invaded the woods by the training grounds.\n\nUruks have begun to attack Ides while searching for the location of the training grounds.
'The Uruk-hai were no match for our strength! Rally to me, [placeholder].'
Ides has ventured with you into the woods.\n\nIdes wishes to speak with you about the Uruk-hai.
'Another band of Uruk-hai! Be on guard.'
Ides ventures with you into the woods.\n\nIdes wishes to speak with you about the hunt
'Hold a moment. From the south... the sound of hooves approaches.'
'Ha! Such a meagre challenge. Come, let us find another.'
'Impressive. I could learn much by observing your tactics.'
'This was a rather fine plan. I feel more confident with each passing victory.'
'The enemy is upon us! To arms, [placeholder]!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow Ides to be defeated</rgb>
Speak with Ides
Ides has ventured into the wooded area adjacent to the training grounds, to test her skill against the wild bears. She is eager to prove herself in battle.
'Something approaches, [placeholder]. What seeks us here among the trees?\n\n'Be ready to stand your ground.'
